name: Dedication to the Person who Becomes the Worst Disaster
summary:
Visual novel announced for the PlayStation 4 by publisher Kemco. 
It is being developed by Water Phoenix with some help from Amphibian, the scenario writer for the visual novel Rei-Jin-G-Lu-P.

alternative_names.name: Saiaku Naru Saiyaku Ningen ni Sasagu
最悪なる災厄人間に捧ぐ
